short_summary: Boxes of personal effects for the National Depot
description: Request for Standing Offer: Acquisition of boxes of personal effects and packaging boxes for the needs of the national depot operations. The procurement is for the Quebec region, with the Correctional Service of Canada as the end user.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title

* English: 21301-236293-B - Boxes of Personal Effects for the National Depot
* French:  21301-236293-B - Boîtes d'Effets Personnels pour le Dépôt National

## Reference Details

* Reference Number: WS3782349822-Doc3841499998
* Solicitation Number: WS3782349822
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: 2023-01-24
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-03-02T14:00:00

## Tender Details

* Tender Status: Expired
* UNSPSC: *24121500
	+ Packaging boxes and bags and pouches
* Procurement Category: *GD
* Notice Type: Request for Standing Offer
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Contact Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Name: Stephane Dube (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: stephane.dube@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Regions of Delivery: Laval

## Tender Description

This request for standing offer is issued by the Public Works and Government Services Canada on behalf of Correctional Services Canada for the acquisition of boxes of personal effects and packaging boxes for the national depot. The required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2 PM EST on March 2, 2023. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

## Attachment

None attached to this document.

## Notice URL

None available.

___________________________________________________________________


(UPDATE) - The date of March 2, 2023 has been replaced with a new date in the text provided. It seems there was an error and the date for the tender has been moved again to 16th February. We should refer to the latest information.
